name: Gravitation (itch) (Re-X)
description:
For online leaderboard ranking, download the standalone version.

Made in 24hrs for Scorespace#7 jam.

Controls:

Left click in space to define velocity of the particle.

R to reload current level.

Scoring system:

Every each level you pass, you get 100 - no. of shots used + 1 points.

An online leaderboard is maintained (Only in standalone version).
